verbose_text: Combining BRAP with UBE2D1, UBE2D2, UBE2D3, or UBE2D4 efficiently produced polyubiquitin chains, whereas combining BRAP with the other E2s failed to generate polyubiquitin chains.
evidence: BRAP with UBE2D1, UBE2D2, UBE2D3, or UBE2D4 efficiently produced polyubiquitin chains, whereas combining BRAP with the other E2s failed to generate polyubiquitin chains
